channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon’s Prime Video is getting AI-generated Video Recaps for some TV shows
item.description: According to Amazon, the feature "utilizes generative AI to create theatrical-quality season recaps with synchronized narration, dialogue, and music."

item.title: Amazon is trialing using AI to generate recaps for some of your favorite Prime Video TV shows
item.description: Prime Video is testing using AI to generate quick video recaps of TV shows, courtesy of a new US beta dubbed 'Video Recap'.

item.title: Conférence sur l’IA | Un robot russe présente ses talents à Vladimir Poutine
item.description: Un des premiers robots russes dotés d’une intelligence artificielle (IA) intégrée, développé par la Sberbank, a dansé pour accueillir le président russe Vladimir Poutine lors de la 10e conférence internationale AI Journey 2025 à Moscou, en Russie, mercredi.

item.title: US, UK, and Australia sanction Russian ‘bulletproof’ web host used in ransomware attacks
item.description: The newly imposed sanctions target Russian-based web host Media Land, which officials say are linked to LockBit and BlackSuit ransomware attacks.

item.title: Online scams skyrocket before Black Friday – NordVPN warns what shoppers should watch out for
item.description: Ready for Black Friday? NordVPN warns against an increase in fake shops and online scams. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: Buying an iPad? These are the early Black Friday deals I recommend at Amazon
item.description: If you're in the market for a cut-price iPad this Black Friday, some early Black Friday iPad deals are already live.

item.title: The Sony Inzone Buds are must-buy gaming earbuds now that they're 27% off
item.description: The Sony Inzone Buds are among the best gaming earbuds you can buy, and you should while they're £50 off.

item.title: Grok dans Siri ? La proposition d’Elon Musk alors que l’iPhone s’ouvre à la concurrence
item.description: Il faut suivre, avec Elon Musk. En août, il traînait Apple en justice pour avoir intégré ChatGPT. Aujourd'hui ? Il propose gentiment d'intégrer sa propre IA, Grok 4.1, directement dans Siri.

item.title: L’Australie teste l’interdiction totale des réseaux sociaux aux moins de 16 ans
item.description: L'Australie a pris le taureau par les cornes : à compter du 10 décembre, les mineurs de moins de 16 ans ne pourront tout simplement plus utiliser les réseaux sociaux comme TikTok, Facebook ou Instagram. Meta, visé au premier chef, prévient que la mesure ne sera pas facile à mettre en œuvre. Pendant ce temps, d'autres pays regardent avec attention ce qui ressemble à un laboratoire....

item.title: Asus routers across the globe hit by suspected Chinese cyberattack - here's what we know
item.description: State-sponsored actors are creating a large operational relay network and are using Taiwanese routers to do so.

item.title: Amazon Is Bringing ‘Stargate’ Back to TV
item.description: 'Stargate' veteran Martin Gero will create the new show, which is based on the hit 1994 film and multiple TV spinoffs.

item.title: This Home Robot Clears Tables and Loads the Dishwasher All by Itself
item.description: Sunday Robotics has a new way to train robots to do common household tasks. The startup plans to put its fully autonomous robots in homes next year.

item.title: YC-backed Poly relaunches as a cloud-hosted file storage with AI search
item.description: Poly's cloud based file storage system with AI-powered search lets you search through text, images, audio, and video.

item.title: The WNBA labor fight is the latest in a the long history of women-led worker movements
item.description: How more than a century of women-led labor activism is influencing the league’s current collective bargaining negotiations. When Minnesota Lynx forward Napheesa Collier calmly sat down and told a group of assembled local media the WNBA is helmed by “the worst leadership in the world” on September 30, she likely did so with a full understanding of the potential impact of her words. ...

item.title: Adobe to buy digital marketing platform Semrush for $1.9 billion
item.description: Semrush designs and develops AI software that helps companies with search engine optimization, social media, and digital advertising. Adobe will acquire software platform Semrush for $1.9 billion, the companies said on Wednesday, as the Photoshop maker looks to strengthen its marketing tools and attract brands with generative artificial intelligence products....

item.title: Verizon's Black Friday iPhone 17 deal gets you a free phone, iPad, and Apple Watch - but read the fine print carefully
item.description: Verizon is throwing in a free iPad and Apple Watch with its Black Friday iPhone 17 deal today - but note, you'll need a

item.title: I bought this gaming tablet at full price and it was brilliant value – now it's £120 off for Black Friday
item.description: The Lenovo Legion Tab (Gen 3) is a fantastic gaming tablet, and now discount for Black Friday.

item.title: Renault prouve que les camions électriques fonctionnent sur longues distances avec ce nouveau modèle
item.description: Renault vient de dévoiler son nouveau camion électrique : un semi-remorque avec 600 km d'autonomie, qui se recharge rapidement. De quoi remplacer les camions diesel ?

item.title: US Approves $1B Loan to Restart Three Mile Island, as Microsoft Data Centers Drive Demand
item.description: The tech giant aims to offset its carbon emissions by bringing back a nuclear reactor in Pennsylvania.

item.title: How to watch Big Brother Australia 2025 online from anywhere
item.description: How to watch Big Brother Australia 2025 online - from anywhere

item.title: Chat Control "brings high risks to society" say privacy experts
item.description: While welcoming voluntary CSAM scanning, scientists warn that some aspects of the revised bill "still bring high risks to society without clear benefits for children."

item.title: Ahead of the official Black Friday PS5 deals starting on Friday, Walmart has a discount on a PS5 console - but you shouldn't buy it
item.description: This early Black Friday PS5 deal at Walmart is absolutely not a Black Friday PS5 deal worth buying

item.title: In Alex Karp’s World, Palantir Is the Underdog
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we get to know Palantir CEO Alex Karp and dive into what his answers in a recent WIRED interview reveal about the larger beliefs driving the tech industry today.

item.title: Amazon n’hésite pas à vendre au rabais de nombreux produits Tech la veille du Black Friday
item.description: Amazon lance à partir de demain ses offres Black Friday, mais certaines sont déjà en lignes. Plusieurs gammes telles que les smartphones, ordinateurs portables, casques audio et consoles de jeux bénéficient actuellement de prix réduits.

item.title: Black Friday PC portables : notre top 10 des meilleurs bons plans sur les configurations gaming et bureautiques
item.description: Besoin d’un nouveau PC portable ? Que vous recherchiez un ordinateur bureautique ou un modèle taillé pour le gaming, il y en a pour tous les goûts durant l’avant-première du Black Friday. Les marques phares comme Apple, Asus, HP, Lenovo ou encore MSI affichent déjà de belles réductions, pour tous les budgets et tous les usages.

item.title: I tested every Galaxy S25 model, and the one I recommend most is on sale now at Amazon and free from Verizon and T-Mobile
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus gives you the most bang for the buck of any Galaxy S25 phone I've tested. It has amazing performance and great battery life, and it's even better when there's a discount.

item.title: It’s official –the Porsche Cayenne Turbo Electric will be the most powerful production Porsche ever made
item.description: The Porsche Cayenne Turbo Electric is officially going to be the "most powerful production Porsche of all time".

item.title: Ce pack Xiaomi avec smartphone + montre + écouteurs est à un super prix en cette veille de Black Friday Week
item.description: Xiaomi, c’est le genre de marque qui rêve d’emménager chez vous, de vous équiper de la tête aux poignets. Pour ce pré-Black Friday, le trio smartphone + montre + écouteurs tombe à bas prix. L’endurant Redmi 15, l'élégante Watch Active 6 et les Buds 6 viennent ensemble, dans un seul et même pack chez Electro Depot au tarif de 229 euros. Oui, moins cher que le prix du smartphone seul, affiché à 253 euros. ...

item.title: Boulanger propose de véritables pépites la veille du véritable Black Friday : le TOP 26 des offres
item.description: Le Black Friday approche, Boulanger met donc en avant une nouvelle série de promotions sur une large sélection de produits. De nombreux appareils bénéficient actuellement de réductions significatives, valables jusqu’à la fin de l’événement.

item.title: Cookies : l’Europe prépare enfin la suppression des fenêtres de consentement obligatoires
item.description: Vous cliquez machinalement sur "Accepter" juste pour accéder au contenu ? Vous n'êtes pas seul : 90 % des internautes font pareil. Bruxelles a enfin pris conscience de l'hypocrisie du système actuel. La Commission prépare une réforme pour supprimer ces fenêtres intrusives au profit d'un réglage unique dans le navigateur.

item.title: Sydney Sweeney’s Transformation Into a Right-Wing Meme Was Not a ‘Total Aesthetic Victory’
item.description: X users have made her the face of bigotry on the platform.

item.title: What happened at Trump’s White House meeting with the Saudi crown prince
item.description: Here is a look at some of the takeaways from the visit. A jovial President Donald Trump held a warm and friendly meeting with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman at the White House, packed with plenty of handshakes and back pats. He brushed aside questions about Saudi Arabia’s human rights record, praised the prince for his statesmanship and announced hundreds of billions of dollars in new Saudi investment in the United States....

item.title: Fnac et Darty dégainent de nouvelles offres à l’approche du véritable Black Friday : les 12 meilleurs deals à saisir
item.description: Les promotions continuent de pleuvoir chez la Fnac et Darty. Les deux enseignes lancent une nouvelle vague d’offres particulièrement attractives lors du pré-Black Friday. On trouve le Pixel 9 à -45 % ou encore le dernier pliant abordable de Samsung à -30 %. Voici celles qui valent réellement le coup.

item.title: 3 Best Hall Effect Keyboards for Gamers and Serious Typists (2025)
item.description: Ascend from your mechanical keyboard to magnetically powered Hall effect switches.

item.title: ‘When I’m eating wings and fries at the same time’—TikTok spoofs flow state
item.description: Social media users are having fun riffing on a genuine psychological phenomenon. Time slows. The mind chatter quietens. Outside distractions dial down to a hum. You are at one with the task at hand. Congratulations, you’ve reached flow state.

item.title: Test du Xgimi Horizon 20 Max, le laser 4K ultime pour le home cinéma
item.description: Doté d’une fiche technique impressionnante et pensé pour les salles lumineuses, le Xgimi Horizon 20 Max vise le très haut de gamme des projecteurs home cinéma. En voici notre test complet.

item.title: NASA’s Perseverance Has Seen a Lot of Rocks—But Not One Like This
item.description: In a first for the Perseverance rover, it appears to have found an iron-nickel meteorite near the Jezero Crater.

item.title: 7 superb portable power station deals that I am going to bookmark for Black Friday, including one that’s over $3,000 off right now!
item.description: Don't wait for Black Friday - there are already some standout portable power stations deals live right now.

item.title: The Verge’s 2025 holiday gift guide for tinkerers
item.description: As AI tools continue to rise in popularity, it's easy to forget the satisfaction of using something that doesn't need an update or a prompt to help you get things done. I'm talking about tools. They're simple and rugged, and they don't make things needlessly complicated. And now that the holidays are approaching, these tools […]

item.title: Tyson Foods will stop calling its beef ‘net zero’ and ‘climate smart’ after lawsuit from environmental group
item.description: The food processing giant had made the claims in its marketing, but the nonprofit EWG alleged that it never defined what they meant. Tyson Foods has agreed to stop making claims about reaching “net zero” or selling “climate-smart” beef for at least five years, part of a settlement from a lawsuit brought against it by the nonprofit Environmental Working Group (EWG)....

item.title: Google Maps adds Gemini-powered tips section, EV charger availability predictions, and more
item.description: Now, when users search for places in Map like restaurants, hotels, or concert venues, they'll see a new "know before you go" tips section that will surface important information about the place.

item.title: Le Black Friday en avance déstocke tous les vidéoprojecteurs ! Voici notre sélection des 11 meilleures promotions
item.description: Les vidéoprojecteurs ont de plus en plus la cote face aux téléviseurs. A tel point que lors des premières offres avant le Black Friday, plusieurs modèles sont mis en promotion. Voici notre sélection complète des meilleures réductions.

item.title: Black Friday Xbox game deals are live – here are the Series X titles actually worth buying starting at under $6
item.description: Xbox Series X games are going cheap ahead of Black Friday, with deals starting under $6.

item.title: Lawmakers want to let users sue over harmful social media algorithms
item.description: Tech critics' least favorite law is under siege again, this time with a focus on its recommendation algorithms. On Wednesday Sens. John Curtis (R-UT) and Mark Kelly (D-AZ) introduced the Algorithm Accountability Act, which amends Section 230 of the Communications Decency Act to make platforms responsible for preventing their recommendation systems from causing certain foreseeable […]...

item.title: Windows 11’s Only New Useful Feature Has Nothing to Do With AI
item.description: We're still waiting to get all those missing Windows 10 features in Windows 11.

item.title: Google patches worrying Chrome zero-day flaw being exploited in the wild - here's how to stay safe
item.description: A bug in Google Chrome V8 allowed for arbitrary code execution, and is being actively exploited.

item.title: 1,2 million de personnes touchées par le piratage de l’Urssaf : quels sont les risques ?
item.description: Un des services de l'Urssaf a subi une cyberattaque massive. Au total, les données de plus d'un million de personnes ont été dérobées. Voici ce que les criminels peuvent en faire.

item.title: Voici les 17 produits Tech pas chers pour se faire plaisir à petit prix lors du pré-Black Friday : la sélection à moins de 100 €
item.description: Le véritable Black Friday arrive à grands pas et de nombreuses promotions sont déjà en ligne. Même avec un budget inférieur à 100 euros, il est possible de se faire plaisir. Pour celles et ceux qui surveillent leurs dépenses, voici une sélection des meilleures offres à ne pas manquer.

item.title: How Donald Trump Lost Control of the Epstein Spin Cycle
item.description: Donald Trump has spent years benefiting from the QAnon's Jeffrey Epstein obsession. That’s all changing.

item.description: Lainey Wilson returns to Bridgestone Arena to celebrate country music’s hottest stars, and our guide explains how to watch CMA Awards 2025 online from anywhere and for free.

item.title: Making a good impression in a new job
item.description: Listening and being humble are two key things to keep in mind. Starting a new job can be exhilarating and stressful at the same time. You are excited to meet new people, take on new responsibilities, and grow. You also want to demonstrate to your new employer that they made the right choice by hiring you.

item.title: You should buy a DualSense Edge this Black Friday, but only if it falls to this price
item.description: There’s a high likelihood of DualSense Edge discounts this Black Friday, but should you really buy one?

item.title: Écrivez comme Google : la nouvelle police Google Sans Flex est gratuite
item.description: Google met à disposition sa propre police de caractère Google Sans Flex. Tout le monde peut s'en servir. On vous explique comment la récupérer.

item.title: Watch how Apple 3D prints Watches by blasting powdered titanium with lasers
item.description: If you compare the Apple Watch Ultra 3 with the Ultra 2, you probably wouldn’t be able to tell they were made with drastically different manufacturing processes. The titanium Apple Watch Series 11 and Ultra 3 are not only made with 100 percent recycled titanium powder, but are also 3D-printed, a process that’s pretty impressive […]

item.title: La nouvelle télécommande Google TV ne meurt jamais
item.description: Les constructeurs de boîtiers de streaming Google TV ont désormais à leur disposition une nouvelle télécommande certifiée. Le modèle G32 comprend évidemment des boutons d'accès vers des services de streaming et surtout, il remplace les piles par une cellule solaire.

item.description: These are the rugged smartphones I'm keeping a close eye on for Black Friday.

item.title: Adobe to buy Semrush for $1.9 billion
item.description: Adobe said it would offer $12 per share for Semrush, almost double the latter's closing price of $6.89 on Tuesday, before news of the deal.

item.title: Disney loses bid to block Sling TV’s one-day cable passes
item.description: A federal judge in New York denied Disney’s request to block Sling TV’s short-term passes, which give viewers the ability to stream live content for as little as one day. In a ruling on Tuesday, US District Judge Arun Subramanian ruled that Disney didn’t prove that Sling TV’s passes caused “irreparable harm” to the entertainment […]

item.title: Voici enfin les premiers prix de la Renault Twingo électrique : moins de 20 000 € confirmé, mais il y a un mais
item.description: À peine présentée, la Renault Twingo E-Tech annonce ses prix pour le marché italien. De quoi offrir une première idée de ce qui nous attend en France, et de découvrir que la promesse d'une voiture électrique à moins de 20 000 euros sera une réalité... un peu plus tard.
